“\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*: ‘\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w either|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* woman \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5087"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w special|strong="H6381"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nazirite|strong="H5139"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w separate|strong="H5144"\w* \w himself|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w separation|strong="H5145"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* eat \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* grapevine, \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seeds|strong="H2785"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* skins.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,
